tweets.content: @TI_EU: Join us for a discussion on Data + Anticorruption at 15:30 in Room A #IODC16pic.twitter.com/AbgHmR2FIK

conference_notes: Fighting against corruption is one of the recurrent uses cases of open data. Civic activists and organizations request and study transparency data to solve different transparency aspects such as unfair market competition, money laundering, tax evasion, and others. Michael Jarvis (Executive Director at Transparency & Accountability Initiative) moderated this anticorruption session with five experts on the topic.
name: Data + Anticorruption
